text:
@jasonrapert @realDonaldTrump There are about 60,000,000 healthcare workers in the world, and there've thus far been 16,000,000 COVID-19 patients.

We're supposed to believe that all of these people and their families and friends are not only lying but maintaining a consistent organized lie?
